During an impromptu bike ride through Barcelona, my friend and I tried to see if we could get into Tickets.  When the waiter said the chance was slim, he recommended we go right across the street to Bodega 1900 which is managed by Ferran Adrià's younger brother Albert Adrià.  The staff was very helpful and friendly, and the food was phenomenal (see photo). I'd recommend those trying to experience molecular gastronomy outside of San Sebastián and who can't try Tickets to come here!
